author: jbeard
msg: These updates allow building the projects from Maven by delegating to Ant in the compile phase. Created new bash script to run the compiled jar. Updated modules paths as well.

author: bayard
msg: Fixing javadoc per LANG-643 to indicate an empty String is returned for negative length and not a thrown exception

author: olegk
msg: Catch and log I/O exceptions thrown by #close() and #shutdown() methods

author: stsp
msg: Rename the --git-diff option to --git for consistency with Mercurial.
